column4: can someone help me correctly setup my hitachi 753 refresh rates, i need help step by step
so none if you know how to change refresh rates? :(
Go find the specs (horizontal and vertical refresh rates) for the monitor, then run "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg"
Then log out and hit "CTRL+ALT+Backspace" from the login screen.
When it asks you for the monitor config style, select 'advanced'
